Articles.Content:
Hello, everyone! I present to you, with no fictional back-story to it, The Starlight Program!

What is the starlight program?

The starlight program is a video series where I am in a Science-mode game and I have three goals (all from the challenge section of the forums):

- The Jool-5 Mission (Jebediah's Level + Grand Tour)

- The Constellation Program

- The Grand Orbital Space Station

The first two are some of the most popular of challenges on the forum, with the third being a more recent and less popular challenge (popular and amazing, nonetheless)

Any mods?

Yes, there are some mods (although you can search them on Google because I'm certainly not going to). I have based my mods around the Jool-5 permitted mods, plus a few extras that don't do much. One modlist:

- Active Texture Manager

- Chatterer

- Distant Object Enhancement

- FAR

- Fire Crew

- Habitat pack

- KAS

- Kerbinside

- KW rocketry

- Launch Countdown

- Ribbons/Final Frontier

- Novapunch 2

- PlanetShine

- Procedural Fairings

- TAC life support

- Trajectories

- Kerbal Alarm Clock

- Tweakables

- Rasterprop Monitor

Is there some sort of schedule?

Not yet, but the series is expected to launch in 2015 (no pun intended with 'launch'). I already have some episodes recorded and ready for upload, though, so it might come a little earlier

Why are you posting this now and not in 2015?

Because I can. That's why. Plus advertisement.

Will there ever be streams on twitch?

100% no up until August. In August, I'll (hopefully) be moving and I'll have a better upload speed than I do now. If you want me to stream, expect around <1 FPS!

I have a question that's not here

If you have a question, ask it. Chances are, someone is also thinking the same. You could also give me a brilliant idea for the series.
